methods.name: getJavaMemoryTotal
methods.desc: Gets the amount of memory available to Java/Bukkit/Minecraft. Note that is not a measurement of all the memory in the machine. To find system wide information look at getSystemMemoryTotal.

methods.name: getJavaMemoryUsage
methods.desc: Gets the amount of memory used by Java/Bukkit/Minecraft. Note that is not a measurement of all the memory used in the machine. To find system wide information look at getSystemMemoryUsage.

methods.name: getDiskSize
methods.desc: Gets the total size of the disk that Minecraft is located on.

methods.name: getDiskUsage
methods.desc: Returns the number of bytes that have been used on the disk that Minecraft is located on.

methods.name: getDiskFreeSpace
methods.desc: Returns the number of free byte on the disk that Minecraft is located on.
